verbs.description: circularize (third-person singular simple present circularizes, present participle circularizing, simple past and past participle circularized)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To publicize something by publishing and distributing circulars.
(transitive) To distribute a circular or circulars to.
examples: Mr and Mrs Aloysius Kirby announce the marriage of their daughter Katherine – I knew neither the girl nor the man she was marrying. They must be circularizing the town.

entries.meaning: To canvass opinion by using a questionnaire.
